attributes.action: Bring Icelandic "Business men" to criminal justice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petition is to allow the investigation and based on the results, the criminal charges to those Icelandic business men that are found responsible for use of illegal methods and negligent in their conduct of business.

Should any wrong doing be found the property and investments should be confiscated and immediately used for the benefit of those who have lost their money and investments.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Icelandic Government.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
